statements: SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_mg > 100;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT patient_id FROM prescriptions ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prescriptions;
SELECT AVG(dosage_mg) FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage_mg FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Twice daily' ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_mg BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_mg < 50 OR dosage_frequency = 'As needed';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_id, dosage_frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_mg <= 75;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Weekly' AND dosage_mg >= 200;
SELECT medication_name, MAX(dosage_mg) FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT medication_name, MIN(dosage_mg) FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) FROM prescriptions;
SELECT AVG(dosage_mg) AS average_dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = '87654321-1234-1234-1234-210987654321';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_mg > 100
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Once a day'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM prescriptions ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT AVG(dosage_mg) AS average_dosage FROM prescriptions

SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY prescription_count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, quantity FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medication_info ON prescriptions.medication_name = medication_info.medication_name WHERE dosage > 75;

SELECT prescriptions.patient_id, medication_info.quantity FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medication_info ON prescriptions.medication_name = medication_info.medication_name WHERE medication_info.quantity > 100;

SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, manufacturer FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medication_info ON prescriptions.medication_name = medication_info.medication_name WHERE prescriptions.patient_id = 'xyz789';

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_id, medication_info.quantity FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medication_info ON prescriptions.medication_name = medication_info.medication_name WHERE prescriptions.dosage > 50;

SELECT prescriptions.patient_id, medication_info.manufacturer FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medication_info ON prescriptions.medication_name = medication_info.medication_name WHERE prescriptions.dosage < 50;

SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;

SELECT patient_name, patient_id FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM medication_prescriptions;
SELECT AVG(dosage) FROM dosage_history;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) FROM medication_prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions INNER JOIN dosage_history ON medication_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_history.prescription_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions LEFT JOIN dosage_history ON medication_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_history.prescription_id;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM dosage_history GROUP BY patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions INNER JOIN dosage_history ON medication_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_history.prescription_id GROUP BY patient_name;

SELECT medication_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions INNER JOIN dosage_history ON medication_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_history.prescription_id GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM dosage_history GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(dosage) FROM medication_prescriptions INNER JOIN dosage_history ON medication_prescriptions.prescription_id = dosage_history.prescription_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, history_id FROM patients JOIN dosage_history ON patients.patient_id = dosage_history.patient_id;
SELECT count(*) AS number_of_prescriptions FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_prescriptions FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING avg_dosage > 50;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_dosage > 500;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, date_prescribed FROM patients JOIN dosage_history ON patients.patient_id = dosage_history.patient_id WHERE date_prescribed >= '2020-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_prescriptions FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY avg_dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patients ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY max_dosage DESC;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, date_prescribed FROM patients JOIN dosage_history ON patients.patient_id = dosage_history.patient_id WHERE date_prescribed BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, date_prescribed FROM patients JOIN dosage_history ON patients.patient_id = dosage_history.patient_id WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';

SELECT dosage_instructions FROM prescriptions;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage_instructions FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id JOIN medications ON medications.medication_id = prescriptions.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '1999-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT prescription_id, dosage_instructions FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_id = 2;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS average_patient_id FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(doctor_id) AS total_doctors FROM doctors GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(medication_id) AS total_medication_id FROM medications GROUP BY medication_name;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, medication_name FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id JOIN patients ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id JOIN medications ON medications.medication_id = prescriptions.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM patients p, prescriptions pr, medications m WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id AND pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, pr.dosage_instructions FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id WHERE p.date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, pr.dosage_instructions FROM patients p, prescriptions pr, medications m WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id AND pr.medication_id = m.medication_id AND p.date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 1;

SELECT doctor_name, p.patient_name, m.medication_name FROM doctors d JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;

SELECT doctor_name, p.patient_name, m.medication_name FROM doctors d, prescriptions pr, patients p, medications m WHERE d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id AND pr.patient_id = p.patient_id AND pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;

SELECT doctor_name, p.patient_name, m.medication_name FROM doctors d JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id WHERE pr.dosage_instructions LIKE '%take%';

SELECT doctor_name, p.patient_name, m.medication_name FROM doctors d, prescriptions pr, patients p, medications m WHERE d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id AND pr.patient_id = p.patient_id AND pr.medication_id = m.medication_id AND pr.dosage_instructions LIKE '%take%';
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM patients p, prescriptions pr WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, COUNT(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM doctors d JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, COUNT(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM doctors d, prescriptions pr WHERE d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, AVG(pr.prescription_id) AS avg_prescriptions FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, AVG(pr.prescription_id) AS avg_prescriptions FROM patients p, prescriptions pr WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, AVG(pr.prescription_id) AS avg_prescriptions FROM doctors d JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, AVG(pr.prescription_id) AS avg_prescriptions FROM doctors d, prescriptions pr WHERE d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, SUM(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, SUM(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM patients p, prescriptions pr WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, SUM(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM doctors d JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT d.doctor_name, SUM(pr.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM doctors d, prescriptions pr WHERE d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT id, medication_name FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies;
SELECT name, location FROM pharmacies;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions_history;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id FROM prescriptions_history;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.id;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name FROM prescriptions LEFT JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.id;

SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name, prescriptions_history.prescription_date FROM prescriptions JOIN prescriptions_history ON prescriptions.id = prescriptions_history.prescription_id;

SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name, prescriptions_history.prescription_date FROM prescriptions LEFT JOIN prescriptions_history ON prescriptions.id = prescriptions_history.prescription_id;

SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name, prescriptions_history.prescription_date FROM prescriptions JOIN prescriptions_history ON prescriptions.id = prescriptions_history.prescription_id JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.id;

SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, patients.name, prescriptions_history.prescription_date FROM prescriptions LEFT JOIN prescriptions_history ON prescriptions.id = prescriptions_history.prescription_id LEFT JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.id;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, doctors.name FROM prescriptions JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.medication_name = doctors.specialization;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, doctors.name FROM prescriptions LEFT JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.medication_name = doctors.specialization;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, pharmacies.name FROM prescriptions JOIN pharmacies ON prescriptions.id = pharmacies.id;
SELECT prescriptions.id, prescriptions.medication_name, pharmacies.name FROM prescriptions LEFT JOIN pharmacies ON prescriptions.id = pharmacies.id;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT p.name, p.age, pr.medication_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT d.name, d.specialization, pr.medication_name FROM doctors d INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.id = pr.id;
SELECT ph.name, pr.medication_name, ph.location FROM pharmacies ph INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON ph.id = pr.id;

SELECT ph.name AS pharmacy_name, p.name AS patient_name, pr.medication_name FROM pharmacies ph INNER JOIN prescriptions_history phis ON ph.id = phis.id INNER JOIN patients p ON phis.patient_id = p.id INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON phis.prescription_id = pr.id;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, prh.prescription_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions_history prh ON p.id = prh.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescriptions;
SELECT AVG(dosage) AS average_dosage FROM prescriptions;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM prescriptions;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT pr.medication_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescriptions pr INNER JOIN prescriptions_history ph ON pr.id = ph.prescription_id GROUP BY pr.medication_name;
SELECT prh.prescription_date, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescriptions_history prh GROUP BY prh.prescription_date ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, pr.medication_name, ph.location FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN pharmacies ph ON pr.id = ph.id ORDER BY p.name, pr.medication_name;
SELECT p.name, pr.medication_name, ph.location FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN pharmacies ph ON pr.id = ph.id WHERE p.age > 50;
SELECT p.name, pr.medication_name, ph.location FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN pharmacies ph ON pr.id = ph.id WHERE ph.location = 'New York';
SELECT p.name, pr.medication_name, d.specialization FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors d ON pr.id = d.id;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, prh.prescription_date, d.name AS doctor_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions_history prh ON p.id = prh.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors d ON prh.prescription_id = d.id;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, prh.prescription_date, ph.name AS pharmacy_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN prescriptions_history prh ON p.id = prh.patient_id INNER JOIN pharmacies ph ON prh.prescription_id = ph.id;
